rules_text:
Each player draws a card and loses 2 life.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens”
special_text:
[+2]: Each player draws a card and loses 2 life.
[-3]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.”
